```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

price_guest_df <- read_csv("cleaned_four_cities.csv") %>%
  select(Accomodates, Price, City) %>%
  mutate(City = factor(City, 
                       levels = c("la","sf","ch","nyc"),
                       labels= c("Los Angeles","San Francisco","Chicago","New York City")))

  ggplot(price_guest_df, 
         aes(y = Price, 
             x = Accomodates, 
             color = City)) +
  geom_point(stat= "identity", 
             position = position_dodge()) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y~log(x), se = FALSE) +
 # facet_grid(~City) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0,1000,100)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,13,1)) +
  labs(y = "Price (USD)", x = "Accomodation (Persons)")

```
